text: Moss Rose is a 1947 American mystery thriller movie. It was directed by Gregory Ratoff. It was based on the novel of the same name by Marjorie Bowen. It stars Vincent Price, Peggy Cummins, Ethel Barrymore, Victor Mature, Margo Woode, George Zucco. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was a box office disappointment. ==Other websites== * * Category:1947 mystery movies Category:1947 thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Gregory Ratoff
title: Moss Rose (movie)
